lines.text: I challenged a Machamp to an arm-wrestling match with three friends.
He beat us all without breaking a sweat. How did he do that?!
Surprised to see a sailor here? I'm on shore leave!
So tonight, I'm eating with family. I hope they won't cook spinach. I hate spinach...
My captain says a Shiny Wailmer ate his leg, and now he seeks revenge.
I told him Wailmer don't snack on people's legs but he won't listen. Oh well.
I've been all around the world, you know?
And I'm telling you. The Pok√©mon you find in other regions... they're weird.
